title: Installation issue: automake
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:


### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install automake%gcc@8.3.1
This tries to install gdbm-1.19.1 but that will not dowload because the mirror at ftpmirror.gnu.org does not have that version. The latest available there is version 1.19 (i.e. no ".1" on the end)


==> Installing gdbm-1.19.1-jpnhaxkad66w7danvaw6cmw4hsf3v5dc
==> No binary for gdbm-1.19.1-jpnhaxkad66w7danvaw6cmw4hsf3v5dc found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://ftpmirror.gnu.org/gdbm/gdbm-1.19.1.tar.gz
-=O#-  #     #       #
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/gdbm/gdbm-1.19.1.tar.gz
#=#=- #     #
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed

/global/scratch/users/cyrusl/centos8spack/loginnode/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1360, in do_fetch:
       1357
       1358        self.stage.create()
       1359        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
  >>   1360        start_time = time.time()
       1361        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1362        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1363
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-1899-995c978f52
* **Python:** 3.7.4
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-haswell
* **Concretizer:** original
<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
None - it is a fresh spack installation
### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
no maintainers are given
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
